BIO

My name is Pavel Sobolev. I was born in Saint-Petersburg in Russia. I have lived there all my life. I have a specialist degree in geology.

I found jobs as a seo-specialist, internet-marketer after i passed short courses of web-design in my city which revealed only HTML,CSS and Photoshop, but always wanted to learn how to code. I am concentrated on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React and Node.js now.

I had bias against programming, but CodeAcademy courses of web-development encouraged me deep down and helped to believe in myself to become a software developer.

After I had learnt theory i understood that practice makes perfect and put my efforts to use some YouTube lessons which i liked. I really enjoyed videos of Brad Traversy . I made this portfolio web-site using his lesson based on Sass and JS.
